formName: C118 section 5 apply for Authorised Economic Operator

sections.title: What is your Economic Operator Registration and Identification (EORI) number?

fields.label: What is your Economic Operator Registration and Identification (EORI) number?
fields.helpText: Enter your country code, for example GB, and then your up to 15 numerical digit EORI number

fields.label: Why am I being asked for this?
fields.infoText: We use your EORI number to link together all forms for your application

fields.label: Have you or the person in charge completed training provided by an recognised educational establishment?
fields.shortName: 5.2.1b: Training provided by a recognised educational establishment
fields.helpText: For example, recognised by the customs authorities or a body of a member state responsible for professional training. [Ref 5.2.1b]
fields.errorMessage: Select whether you or the person in charge has had training provided by a recognised educational establishment

fields.label: Have you or the person in charge completed training provided by a recognised professional or trade association?
fields.shortName: 5.2.1c: Training provided by a professional or trade association
fields.helpText: For example, provided by the customs authorities of a member state or accredited in the Union the purposes of providing such qualification. [Ref 5.2.1c]
fields.errorMessage: Select whether you or the person in charge has had training provided by a profession or trade association

sections.title: Have you completed all the forms for your application?
sections.shortName: Completion of all C117 and C118 forms
sections.description: You need to send all relevant forms within a 24 hour period, or your application will be rejected.

fields.label: What do I need to complete?
fields.infoText:
If you are applying for AEO status customs simplification (AEOC) you need to complete the following forms:

C117

C118-1-1

C118-1-2

C118-1-3

C118-2

C118-3-1

C118-3-2

C118-4

C118-5


If you are applying for AEO status security and safety (AEOS) you need to complete the following forms:

C117

C118-1-1

C118-1-2

C118-1-3

C118-2

C118-3-1

C118-3-2

C118-4

C118-6-1

C118-6-2

C118-6-3

C118-6-4


If you are applying for both you need to complete the following forms:

C117

C118-1-1

C118-1-2

C118-1-3

C118-2

C118-3-1

C118-3-2

C118-4

C118-5

C118-6-1

C118-6-2

C118-6-3

C118-6-4
### If you are not ready to send all your forms within this period, you need to save and come back later.

fields.label: Provide details below of who is signing the declaration
Job title
fields.helpText: For example, director, financial controller or secretary

fields.label: Email address
fields.helpText: We will send an email to this address to confirm we’ve received this form

fields.infoText: By sending this form, you declare that the information you have provided is true and complete.
This is your last opportunity to print or save a PDF copy of your submitted form.

You need to send us all of the relevant forms within **24 hours**.

If you do not send us these details in time, you will need to start a new application.

If you have sent us all the relevant details, we will tell you within 60 calendar days if your application has been successful.

If your application is unsuccessful we will tell you why.

**If you need help**

[Check the guidance](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/authorised-economic-operator-certification) to find out: 
- what you need to do while we process your application
- how to make changes to your application
- how to contact HMRC about your application
